sentences.en: Local deviations depend strongly on the local geometry of the solid matrix.
sentences.cn: 局部偏离严格地依赖于固体矩阵的局部几何形状.

sentences.en: Macromolecules cannot approach the ligand owing to steric hindrance of the matrix.
sentences.cn: 由于载体的立体位阻的关系,大分子化合物不能接触到配基.

sentences.en: Matrix formulations are ideally suited to the storage facilities of computers.
sentences.cn: 矩阵列方程最适于计算机存储.

sentences.en: The basis matrix B is unimodular.
The condition number, defined below, is changed by scaling the matrix.
sentences.cn: 调整矩阵的比例就改变了下面定义的条件数.

sentences.en: The fracture surface traverses matrix as well as fibers and interface.
sentences.cn: 断裂表面横切过基体、纤维和界面.

sentences.en: The matrix is defined as the reciprocal of A.
sentences.cn: 该矩阵定义为A之逆矩阵.

sentences.en: The square matrix is called a diagonal matrix.
sentences.cn: 该方矩阵称为对角矩阵.

sentences.en: They may be conveniently expressed in the following matrix form.
sentences.cn: 它们可以方便地表示成下列矩阵形式.

sentences.en: This matrix is condensed by the equation.
This matrix is symmetric and banded , the band being equal to four.
sentences.cn: 这个矩阵是对称的且是带状的, 带宽等于四.

sentences.en: This may be reduced to the much more condensed matrix form.
sentences.cn: 这可以简化成较精简的矩阵形式.

sentences.en: This strain can be compared directly with the allowable matrix strain.
sentences.cn: 这个应变值能直接与基体容许应变比较.

sentences.en: We now omit the prime on the matrix elements.
sentences.cn: 我们现在把各矩阵元素上的一撇略去.

words.tran_cn: [数]矩阵；模型；[生物][地质]基质；母体；子宫；脉石

phrases.tran_cn: 雅可比矩阵；[数]导数矩阵

trans.tran_en: an arrangement of numbers, letters, or signs in rows and  column s  that you consider to be one amount, and that you use in solving mathematical problems
